title: Nvidia Joins Big Tech Deal Spree to License Chip Technology from Groq
description: Groq specialises in what is known as inference, where artificial intelligence models that have already been trained respond to requests from users.
content:
Nvidia has agreed to license chip technology from startup Groq and hire away its CEO, a veteran of Alphabet's Google, Groq said in a blog post on Wednesday.
